mdRecord.dcterms:title: Beaux Arts Ball at University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Shown above is one of the couples attending the Beaux Arts Ball held recently in the Fine Arts Museum at the University of Virginia. The Ball revived what was once an annual tradition of the University's school of art and architecture. Shown are Mr. and Mrs. Howard Besosa, San Juan, Puerto Rico, whose costumes were judged "most beautiful" at the ball."
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faculty
